subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A resurgent Fernando Torres scored his fifth goal in three matches to help Chelsea reach the Club World Cup final with a 3-1 victory over Monterrey of Mexico in Yokohama, Japan.
snippet: A resurgent Fernando Torres scored his fifth goal in three matches to help Chelsea reach the Club World Cup final with a 3-1 victory over Monterrey of Mexico in Yokohama, Japan.
